patch:
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index 3ad8f06..6b765e2 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@
     "preview": "vite preview"
   },
   "dependencies": {
-    "vue": "^2.7.0"
+    "vue": "^3.4.23"
   },
   "devDependencies": {
     "@vitejs/plugin-vue2": "^1.1.2",
@@ -17,4 +17,4 @@
     "vite": "^3.0.7",
     "vue-tsc": "^0.39.5"
   }
-}
\ No newline at end of file
+}
diff --git a/src/main.ts b/src/main.ts
index 293565a..b670de8 100644
--- a/src/main.ts
+++ b/src/main.ts
@@ -1,7 +1,4 @@
-import Vue from "vue";
+import { createApp } from "vue";
 import App from "./App.vue";
 
-new Vue({
-  el: "#app",
-  render: (h) => h(App),
-});
+createApp(App).mount("#app");
diff --git a/yarn.lock b/yarn.lock
index 4ff03cb..e933319 100644

+++ b/yarn.lock
